nodes.text: The Artist of Naboo is a 12-page comic featured in Star Wars: Visionaries, written and drawn by Erik Tiemens.

The story follows an anonymous Naboo artist, who is captivated by the beauty of Padmé Amidala after a chance encounter.
He begins using her as inspiration for his art which also leads to disturbing premonitions about her future, until he risks his life to save hers.
